name: NSSharingServicePicker
desc: A list of sharing services from which the user can choose.

items.name: init(items: [Any])
items.desc: Initializes a new sharing service picker for the selected items.

items.name: func show(relativeTo: NSRect, of: NSView, preferredEdge: NSRectEdge)
items.desc: Shows the picker, populated with sharing services related to the instance items.
